text: Ašanja () is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Pećinci municipality, in the Srem District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and its population numbering 1,488 people (2002 census). ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Syrmia Category:Populated places in Srem District Category:Pećinci
title: Ašanja
